segments.text: You should draw a picture of a fancy kingdom of animals in forty minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just imagine , if a horse can fly , if a bird can swim ... and things like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . But could you give me another piece of paper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Here you are . Anybody who wants help , please come to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much , Mr Addison .
segments.speaker: S2
